title: Into the Ether
description: ***This book is now out of print.***As a Touch-Know, Genevieve has never been required to steal more than a few paltry coins. But when a powerful stranger requires their help, her family of street-wise thieves sends her to get the most important thing they’ve ever decided to liberate. It was supposed to be a simple overnight job. Instead, Genevieve is required to appear attached to her mark, the curator of the British Museum. For Genevieve it becomes more than an act, and her problems are far more significant than the possibility of her lies being discovered.When her family betrays her, she must make an important choice – turn to the man who has destroyed everything she holds dear, or strike out on her own.
author: Vanessa Barger
